# Data types

Each object has a data type:
  
* Numeric (number - integer or double)
* Character (text)
* Logical (TRUE / FALSE)

## Checking data types

Number:
```{r}
a <- 10
mode(a)
typeof(a)
str(a)
```

Text:
```{r}
b <- "word"
mode(b)
typeof(b)
str(b)
```

**HANDS-ON** (3 minutes)

1. Create the following objects:
```{r, eval=F}
o1 <- "R course"
o2 <- 10
o3 <- FALSE
o4 <- "9"
```
2. Check the data type of each object with **mode**.
3. Did you expect a different result? Why?
